item.title: Version 1.2.17 (Build 20251229.1)
item.description:
What's New

feat: Implement automatic XKeyIM updates

  • Add XKeyIMUpdateManager for silent auto-update of XKeyIM
  • Automatically install bundled XKeyIM on XKey app startup
  • Sync XKeyIM version with XKey app version (1.2.17 build 20251229.1)
  • No user interaction required - fully automatic background process
  • Connect debug logging to DebugWindow for troubleshooting

Implementation details:

  • XKeyIMUpdateManager.swift: Core update logic (246 lines)
  • AppDelegate: Trigger update 3 seconds after app launch
  • SparkleUpdateDelegate: Connect debug logging
  • Force install mode: Always sync XKeyIM with bundled version
  • Silent operation: No notifications, no prompts, no user interruption

Benefits:

  • XKeyIM always in sync with XKey app
  • Zero maintenance for users
  • Handles corrupted/missing XKeyIM automatically
  • Clean, professional user experience
